title: <Chat Disconnection>
body: This is really driving me up a wall this bug has been going of for mouths and y'all have done nothing to fix it if anything the bug has only gotten worse y'all release all this in game purchases items, characters and crap to put more money in your pocket but y'all still haven't fixed the big bug that has been going on for mouths I'm so sick to getting disconnected from chat and after finally reconnecting back into the game I find a team of fed enemies because my team was down a champ or two or worse after finally getting back into the game because your chat was constantly disconnecting only to find out at the end of the game you got flagged by leaver busters for afk. having to wait 20 min just to play a game of league isn't fun at all and its even less fun when the cause of you being afk is from something you can't control honestly I don't think we should be penalized for something we can't control I feel that leaver buster should be removed until this problem is fix

replies.body: There aren't any server issues or bugs that should be kicking you out of game and chat, but it does sound like there some kind of network issue going on.  Specifically, connection to our chat and game servers seems to get cut off and that can happen with a weak or problematic connection.  I suggest going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get you back in game and the client for good.  Hope it helps!
